ðŸ“– Summary: BroTab is a command-line tool for managing browser tabs. It allows users to list, close, reorder, open, and activate tabs directly from the terminal. BroTab supports various operations like searching tabs, moving them between windows, and updating tab properties, enhancing productivity for users who prefer command-line interfaces.
